name: CLM_EDIT_WQ_CLM
description:
This table contains the basic information pertaining to a claim in a claim edit workqueue. Rows for claims still in the error pool will be updated.


Note that there are two date fields: EXTRACT_DATE indicates the most recent update where a claim was in the error pool. CLM_PROCESS_DATE indicates when the claim was originally processed and entered the error pool.

columns.name: CLP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim record that entered the claim edit workqueue.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The ID of the service area that appears on this claim.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The ID of the location that appears on this claim.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the payor that appears on this claim.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The benefit plan ID that appears on this claim.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID that appears on the claim.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage ID that appears on the claim.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The account ID that appears on the claim.

columns.name: TOTAL_CHARGES
columns.description: The dollar amount of charges on the claim.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAYMENTS
columns.description: The dollar amount in payments that appear on the claim. This applies to claims that have already had payments made on them.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the invoice record associated with the claim.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: The invoice number that appears on the claim. NOTE: This is not the same as the invoice ID.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: The place of service for the claim.

columns.name: PREDETERMINATION_YN
columns.description: Stores a Yes/No indicator that the associated record represents a request for a predetermination of benefits.

columns.name: BILL_AREA_ID
columns.description: Stores the Bill Area (BIL .1) associated with the claim.

columns.name: BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: TOTAL_DUE
columns.description: The total amount due on the claim.

columns.name: TOTAL_INS_DUE
columns.description: Stores the insurance amount due for the charges on the claim.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAT_DUE
columns.description: Stores the patient amount due for the charges on the claim.

columns.name: TOTAL_NONCVD_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total non-covered amount associated with the charges on the claim.

columns.name: TOTAL_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total adjustment amount posted to the charges on the claim.
